** postcss-flexbox
PostCSS Flexbox provides an easy to use option for using CSS3 Flexbox layouts. This is supported by IE 10+ and all evergreen browsers.

** Installation

** Usage
*** Horizontal box
`.horizontal-box {
  box: 'horizontal';
}`
![Alt text](./snapshots/snapshot1.png "Horizontal Box")
